definition: to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil

pinyin: nei4 bao4 fa3 yuan2 zi3 dan4

sentences.english: Must I repeat MUST get bigger or the system implodes .
sentences.chinese: 我必須重申必須得到更大的或系統內爆。

sentences.english: The implode effect simulates the center of your image being sucked into a virtual black hole.
sentences.chinese: 內爆效果模擬了您圖像的中心被吸入虛擬黑洞的情形。

sentences.english: Predictions of the spectacular implosion of English soccer are not new.
sentences.chinese: 對於英格蘭足球發生壯觀內爆的預言並不新奇。

sentences.english: An plastic scintillation detector was used to measure D-D neutron yield. The neutron yields are about 108.
sentences.chinese: 通過塑料閃爍探測器測到了輻射驅動內爆中子產額。
